statements: SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT member_id, diagnosis_code, claim_amount FROM medical_records WHERE claim_status='Pending';
SELECT claim_id, treatment_code, claim_amount FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis_code='ABC123';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE claim_status='Approved' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT member_id, claim_id, claim_status FROM medical_records WHERE claim_status='Rejected';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT member_id, treatment_code, claim_status FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis_code = 'A123' AND claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT member_id, claim_id, claim_amount FROM medical_records WHERE treatment_code LIKE 'T12%' ORDER BY claim_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis_code, COUNT(*) AS num_claims FROM medical_records GROUP BY diagnosis_code HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount, MIN(claim_amount) AS min_claim_amount, MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM medical_records WHERE claim_status = 'Submitted';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'M' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'F' ORDER BY patient_dob ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'M' ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31' AND patient_gender = 'F';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_name ILIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT claim_id, date_filed, amount, status FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT  provider_name, location, specialty FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_filed DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM Medical_Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Medical_Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'F';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob ASC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Medical_Providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'F';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM Medical_Providers JOIN Claims ON Medical_Providers.provider_id = Claims.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name, provider_specialty;
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM Patients JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id WHERE claim_amount > 1000;

SELECT provider_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM Medical_Providers JOIN Claims ON Medical_Providers.provider_id = Claims.provider_id JOIN Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Payments.claim_id GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM Providers ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT insurer_name, address, phone_number FROM Insurers;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM Providers WHERE insurance_accepted = TRUE ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT insurer_name, address, phone_number FROM Insurers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY insurer_name ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
